data.title: How to Order Vegan Pizza at 50+ Chains
data.meta_description: Vegan pizza, anyone? This guide covers vegan options across North America at pizza chains such as Papa Murphy's and Little Caesars.
data.text:
Vegan pizza: It’s arguably the best culinary creation on the planet. And it’s getting even better, since PETA has worked with businesses to expand their meat- and dairy-free options. We’re thrilled that many chains now offer vegan cheeses, animal-free meats, and scrumptious veggies, making it easy for compassionate customers to find fresh, tasty pizza.

Satisfying our pizza cravings should never mean supporting the cruel meat and dairy industries, which exploit thinking, feeling individuals. Every animal is someone—not something—and not ours to use. By simply choosing nondairy cheese and other vegan toppings, we can make a huge difference for cows, pigs, chickens, and all other animals.

Papa Murphy’s

Known for its Take ’N’ Bake pizzas, Papa Murphy’s offers vegan cheese from Violife as an option on all its pies. Create your own, or go for the Dairy-Free Cheese Garden Veggie, which is vegan as is.

MOD Pizza

MOD Pizza added its first vegan meat option, a plant-based Italian sausage crumble from Plantly. Other vegan options include Daiya mozzarella cheese, original pizza crust, gluten-free pizza crust, red sauce, spicy red sauce, BBQ sauce, garlic rub, balsamic fig glaze, BBQ swirl, hot Buffalo sauce, and limited-edition romesco sauce.

Toppers Pizza

Toppers Pizza offers tons of delicious vegan options, including its house pizzas, the Vegan Buffalo Chicken-Less Topper, the Vegan Korean BBQ Chicken-Less Topper, and the Vegan Tuscano Topper. Its hand-tossed, thin, and Tall Boy crusts are all vegan, along with many sauces (including even vegan ranch). You can get creative with toppings, such as plant-based crispy chicken, tater tots, and roasted garlic.

UNO Pizzeria & Grill

UNO Pizzeria & Grill serves customizable pizzas with tons of vegan options, including Daiya mozzarella cheese and Beyond Burger Crumbles. In addition, the chain offers a vegan Beyond Burger.

Sarpino’s Pizzeria

This pizza chain, with locations throughout the Midwest and Southeast, is known for its innovative toppings. At many stores, Sarpino’s offers an exciting vegan menu that varies per location, and can range from classics like a Vegan Margarita pizza to a Vegan Sausage Calzone made with Daiya cheese and Beyond Meat Italian sausage. Different locations also offer vegan cheesy bread, garlic bread, salads, pastas, grilled cheese, and more.

Boston’s Pizza (U.S.) and Boston Pizza (Canada)

These sister companies added vegan cheese to their menus at some locations. Choose the Original or Thin crust, and pile on your choice of veggies.

Pizza 73

Compassionate customers at popular Canadian chain Pizza 73 can customize their animal-free pizzas to include a vegan cauliflower crust, dairy-free cheese, and Yves Veggie Cuisine pepperoni.

PizzaRev

PizzaRev has vegan sausage when you’re in the mood for a hearty pizza, and it also offers vegan cheese. Choose either the original or gluten-free crust, which are both vegan, and top it with some veggies.

Pizza Pizza

Canadian pizza powerhouse Pizza Pizza has partnered with Yves Veggie Cuisine to launch a plant-based pepperoni. Pizza Pizza is becoming a go-to for compassionate Canadian customers, as its classic and whole grain pizza crusts are vegan and it also provides delicious dairy-free cheese from Violife, which can replace cow’s milk mozzarella on any of its pizzas.

Blaze Pizza

Following talks with PETA, Blaze Pizza is spicing up its pizza game and now offers vegan Spicy Chorizo as a topping. For those who like cheese pizza, the chain also offers Daiya cheese for no extra charge. Both the traditional and gluten-free crusts are vegan as are the classic red sauce, the spicy red sauce, the BBQ drizzle, and the olive oil drizzle.

Mellow Mushroom

Not only does Mellow Mushroom have vegan pies made with Follow Your Heart cheese, it also offers tempeh hoagies and vegan pretzels.

Pieology

Vegan toppings abound at Pieology, as the fast-casual chain offers several vegan meats, including Gardein vegan meatballs, chicken, and Italian sausage! Use the gluten-free crust, red sauce, olive oil, or BBQ sauce. Daiya cheese is available as well!

zpizza

You can have more than a dozen of the pizzas at this establishment by simply opting for vegan cheese. It’s super-cool interactive online menu tells you how to make your pizza vegan just by checking a box. And don’t miss the Beyond Meat sausage!

Buddy’s Restaurant and Pizzeria

Buddy’s offers delightful Detroit-style pizza that can be ordered with Daiya cheese.

Brixx Pizza

Vegan cheese is available at no extra charge! That’s what we like to hear. Traditional and whole-wheat dough are vegan as well.

Minsky’s Pizza

Savor a slice of Minsky’s gourmet pizza with Daiya vegan cheese and Beyond Meat crumbles.

Patxi’s Pizza

This pizza place offers Daiya vegan cheese and a homemade sauce, and all of its crusts are vegan. It also has deep-dish and pan pizza that’s vegan as is.

Amici’s East Coast Pizzeria

Amici’s East Coast Pizzeria offers clearly labeled vegan options that vary by location. Options include the One Step Beyond Pizza, which feautres a housemade Beyond Meat sausage and can be ordered with vegan cheese.

Fresh Brothers

Fresh Brothers offers several vegan pizzas and even has baked vegan tenders as well as dairy-free Sweet Knots for dessert.

Picazzo’s Healthy Italian Kitchen

This Arizona chain has a massive vegan menu that includes everything from appetizers and pasta dishes to pizzas. It serves classic pies like the Vegan Naples Margherita as well as unique options like the spicy Vegan Elote, which is topped with nondairy butter garlic sauce, corn, and creamy chipotle drizzle.

Pizza Lucé

Offerings vary by location, but with options such as vegan nuggets, slow-roasted jackfruit, and homemade vegan cheese made from tofu and cashews, you can’t go wrong at this Minnesota-based chain. It

Pie Five Pizza

This Dallas-based chain offers Daiya cheese, vegan crust, and five vegan sauces. Get thyself to a location ASAP.

MidiCi

MidiCi specializes in crafting Neapolitan pizzas and offers vegan cheese and sausage at all its locations.

Uncle Maddio’s Pizza Joint

Get your pizza with vegan cheese, and top it off with some grilled tofu.

&pizza

With clearly marked vegan options, you can’t go wrong at this chain. Its toppings include vegan mozzarella cheese and Daring Foods Plant Chicken. Don’t forget to add a side of vegan knots!

Two Boots

At Two Boots, sink your teeth into a slice loaded with delicious dairy-free cheese, vegan sausage, and all the veggies. The chain features its own vegan creations, too, including V for Vegan and Earth Mother, available all the time as full-sized pizzas or on rotation for by-the-slice.

The Pie Pizzeria

At any of The Pie Pizzeria’s six locations in Utah, you can order from a plethora of options on its vegan menu, including animal-friendly Buffalo wings and the Vegan Chicken Bacon Ranch Pie. Yes, please!

800 Degrees

Not only can you get Daiya mozzarella shreds, some 800 Degrees locations also offer animal-free meat as a topping.

Other great pizza chains that offer vegan options:

America’s Incredible Pizza Company

Busboys and Poets

Escape From New York Pizza

Extreme Pizza

Fired Pie

Fuel Pizza

Ian’s Pizza

Live Basil Pizza

Lucifer’s Pizza

New York Pizza Dept

Oath Craft Pizza

Panago Pizza

Paulie Gee’s

Pete’s New Haven Style Apizza

Pi Pizzeria

Pitfire Pizza

Pizza Studio

Prime Pizza

Pyro’s Fire Fresh Pizza

Rapid Fired Pizza

Sammy’s Woodfire Pizza and Grill

Ynot Italian

Your Pie

Zachary’s Chicago Pizza, Inc

There you have it! Now what are you waiting for? Head to these eateries ASAP. And on days when you’re feeling extra-inspired, well, you can always make your own. Yum!
